definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about tunnel inspection logs.
- Tunnel inspection logs are like traffic logs for tunnel sessions; they display entries of non-encrypted tunnel sessions.

## Widgets
1. Total Tunnel Inspection Events
2. Tunnel Inspection Events Overtime
3. Bytes Activity Overtime
4. Packets Activity Overtime
5. Action Distribution
6. Top Rules
7. Top Flags
8. Tunnel Type Distribution 
9. Severity Distribution
10. Top Inbound Interfaces
11. Top Outbound Interfaces
12. Top Source Users
13. Top Destination Users
14. Top Sources
15. Top Destinations
16. Source Zone Distribution
17. Destination Zone Distribution
18. Top Source Locations
19. Top Destination Locations
20. Source Geolocations
21. Destination Geolocations
22. Top Applications
23. Application Technologies
24. Appplication Categories
25. Application Subcategories
26. SAAS Applications
27. Sanctioned Applications
28. Distribution by Application Risk
29. Top Application Characteristics
30. Session End Reasons
31. Virtual Systems
32. Top Application Container
33. Top IP Protocols
34. Total Packets Transferred
35. Packets Dropped (Max Encapulation)
36. Packets Dropped (Unknown Protocol)
37. Packets Dropped (Tunnel Fragment)
38. Packets Dropped (Strict Checking)
39. Log Details
